## Source: ossf-package-analysis (50d802a4efa3139f3908c23a67ec72cc2989d4abba438778fef7501c86765b75)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'google-webfonts-helper' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
